name: SperseStab™ 5153
description: SperseStab™ 5153 is a mid-weight hindered amine light stabilizer with excellent permanence and compatibility with various filled systems, including carbon black, talc, CaCO3, Mg(OH)2, and others. This cost-effective product is ideal for roofing membranes, exterior packaging, and machine parts. The use of filled systems is becoming increasingly popular due to their structural, economic, and processing advantages. SperseStab™ 5153 can be used alone or in combination with other additives, including antioxidants, hindered amine light stabilizers, and UV absorbers. Other potential applications include filled nylon systems with SperseStab™ 5153 alone or in conjunction with other antioxidants.
